Friday night #fiano - 2015 Feudi di San Gregorio - DOCG Fiano di Avellino - bright floral aromas, ripe stone fruit and pear on the palate. At 13.5% abv this is a weighty white, but itâ€™s nicely balanced by good acidity and minerality. Good value at $35 a bottle.

In stock! A delicious rose from the Tavel region of France, Tavel de Prieure de Montesargues. This rose is full-flavoured, dry and delicious. 55% Grenache, 30% Cinsault, 15% Clairette. Loads of red berry and summer fruit flavours and aromas. 13.5% abv. #yegwine

Sunday treat Super Tuscan (Cab. Sauv., Petit Verdot, Merlot, Sangiovese) '01 Argiano Solengo ($98 in '21 estate sale). Mid ruby, amber edges; mid alcohol (13.5 alc.); red fruit, earth, mushroom nose; full body; long rich red fruit finish. w/veal. 17 UC Davis scale, 92 others.
